Name: The Steps as we know them
About the game: In The Steps as we know them, you use the moves of chess to find your way through different worlds. It is a puzzle game with a relaxing atmosphere. The game has simple mechanics, but is challenging at the same time. Different situations Every world you come across uses a different chess piece and brings a different tactic with it. The levels build up from the easy moves of a pawn to the difficult situations of a knight. Sometimes you can work your way through by being stubborn. In other levels you have to take a step back and take a second look. The game 6 worlds 6 different chess pieces ~7 levels per world From easy to complicated
